word_mean: 谷氨酰胺：一酰胺谷氨酸，C5H10N2O3，存在于许多植物汁液和一些动物组织，尿氨的重要载体，通过谷氨酰胺酶在肾脏内分解

sentence.Network_en: The amide nitrogen of glutamine or asparagine functions more effectively than ammonia.
sentence.Network_cn: 谷酰胺或天门冬酰胺的酰胺氮作用较氨更有效.

sentence.Network_en: Glutamine rather than ammonia may be the preferential substrate.
sentence.Network_cn: 谷酰胺可能是比氨还要合适的底物.

sentence.Network_en: TDAG 51 protein is rich in PQ ( praline - glutamine ) motif at the C terminal.
sentence.Network_cn: TDAG51是PQR ( proline-glutamine-rich ) 蛋白,在其C - 端富含PQ即脯氨酸和谷氨酰胺.
